content: crochet this sweet daisy baby blanket using soft and washable worsted weight yarn choose different color combinations to customize this blanket for your little ones this baby blanket uses 7 skeins of color theory yarn by lion brand 4 skeins of the main color tourmaline 3 skeins of the petal color ivory and 1 skein of the center color bee pollen the pattern is written in us crochet terminology and the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 8 pages including the cover page step-by-step pictures and full pattern a free version of this pattern can be found here 1 on my blog gauge each granny square is 4 25 /10 8 cm x 4 25 /10 8 cm there is a youtube video that you can follow along with that goes through all 5 rounds of the daisy granny square you can adjust the playback speed if you would like to slow it down i also have a video tutorial showing how to seam the granny squares together and crochet the border note that this is the baby version of the chunky blanket - to see the chunky version please visit this listing ** here 2 ** 1 https //www allaboutami com/baby-cozy-days-daisy-blanket/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cozy-days-daisy-blanket
